    • Method Detail

      • createQuestion

        Question createQuestion(Event event,
                        java.lang.String question,
                        float betMinimum)
                 throws EventFinished,
                        QuestionAlreadyExist
        This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
        Parameters:
        event - to which question is added
        question - text of the question
        betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
        Returns:
        the created question, or null, or an exception
        Throws:
        EventFinished - if current data is after data of the event
        QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        collection of events

      • getEventsMonth

        java.util.List<java.util.Date> getEventsMonth(java.util.Date date)
        This method retrieves from the database the dates a month for which there are events
        Parameters:
        date - of the month for which days with events want to be retrieved
        Returns:
        collection of dates

      • initializeBD

        void initializeBD()
        This method calls the data access to initialize the database with some events and questions. It is invoked only when the option "initialize" is declared in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file

      • login

        int login(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password)
   throws IncorrectLogin
        This method logs in a user.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        0 If the logged in user is an administrator
        Throws:
        IncorrectLogin - if there is no username that fits with the password

      • registerUser

        void registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String surname,
                  java.lang.String idNumber,
                  java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.util.Date birthDate,
                  java.lang.String userType,
                  java.lang.String cCard,
                  java.lang.String password2)
           throws ExistingUsername,
                  NotMatchingPasswords,
                  Underage,
                  InvalidEmail,
                  java.text.ParseException,
                  InvalidID
        This method registers a user and stores it in the database
        Parameters:
        name - of the user
        surname - of the user
        idNumber - ID card of the user
        email - of the user
        username - of the user
        password - of the user
        password2 - of the user
        birthDate - Birth date of the user
        userType - Specifies which type of user is
        cCard - Credit card of the user
        Throws:
        ExistingUsername - If the chosen username is already used
        NotMatchingPasswords - If password1 and password2 are different
        Underage - If the user is underage
        java.text.ParseException - If the introduced date has a wrong format
        InvalidID - If the introduced ID card is not correct
        InvalidEmail

      • createEvent

        void createEvent(int eventNumber,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 java.util.Date date)
          throws EmptyDescription,
                 InvalidDate,
                 ExistingEvent
        This method creates an event and stores it in the database
        Parameters:
        eventNumber - The number of the event
        description - Description of the event
        date - Date in which the event is going to be celebrated
        Throws:
        EmptyDescription - If the inserted description is empty
        InvalidDate - If the introduced date has already passed
        ExistingEvent - If the event already exists

      • createFee

        Fee createFee(java.lang.Integer id,
              Question question,
              java.lang.String inputPred,
              double inputFactor)
       throws EventFinished,
              ExistingFee,
              EmptyDescription
        It creates a possible to a query
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the Fee
        question - Question to which the create fee belongs
        inputPred - Possible answer to the question
        inputFactor - Factor to multiply bet money in case of win
        Returns:
        created fee
        Throws:
        EventFinished - If the chosen event has already finished
        ExistingFee - If the created fee already exists
        EmptyDescription - If the inserted description is empty

      • createBet

        Bet createBet(java.lang.Float betMoney,
              RegisteredUser u,
              java.util.Date date,
              Fee f,
              java.lang.String description,
              Question que)
       throws EventFinished,
              ExistingBet,
              EmptyDescription,
              InsufficientMoney,
              LessThanTheMinimumMoney,
              NotSelectedFee
        RegisteredUser makes a bet, and bet money is taken from the total quantity of the user
        Parameters:
        betMoney - Money that has been bet
        u - User that has bet
        date - Date of the chosen event
        f - Chosen fee
        description - Short description of the bet
        que -
        Returns:
        Created bet
        Throws:
        EventFinished - If the chosen event has already finished
        ExistingBet - If the created bet already exists
        EmptyDescription - If the inserted description is empty
        InsufficientMoney - If the user has not got sufficient money to bet
        LessThanTheMinimumMoney - If the user tries to bet a quantity which is less than the minimum of the question
        NotSelectedFee

        Bet removeBet(RegisteredUser user,
              Bet bet,
              Fee fee,
              Question question)
       throws NotSelectedBet
        It removes a already made bet from a RegisteredUser, and returns the bet money to him.
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUser that made the bet
        bet - Bet to be removed
        Returns:
        The removed bet
        Throws:
        NotSelectedBet

      • updateMoney

        void updateMoney(RegisteredUser user,
                 double quantity,
                 boolean selected)
          throws InsufficientMoney,
                 UnspecifiedMovement
        It updates the amount of money a user has
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUser whose money needs to be updated
        quantity - The amount of money to be added or substracted
        selected - Whether the money has to be added or substracted
        Throws:
        InsufficientMoney - If the user has not got sufficient money to taken
        UnspecifiedMovement - If the user has not selected whether they want to take or insert money

        void updateWonMoney(RegisteredUser user,
                    double quantity)
        It updates the won money of an user
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUser whose won money needs to be updated
        quantity - Quantity The amount of money to be added

      • enterResult

        void enterResult(Fee selectedFee,
                 Question q,
                 java.util.Date date)
          throws WinnerAlreadyExist,
                 EventUnfinished,
                 NotSelectedFee
        This method sets a winner for a Fee
        Parameters:
        selectedFee - Fee whose winner will be set
        q - Question the fee is from
        date - Date the Event happens
        Throws:
        WinnerAlreadyExist - If the winner for the Fee is already set
        EventUnfinished - If the Event has not happened
        NotSelectedFee - It the user has not selected any fee

        money - Money to subtract
        question - Question to subtract the money
        Returns:
        Total profit made by the selected question

      • getUserToReplicate

        RegisteredUser getUserToReplicate(java.lang.String replicatedUsername,
                                  java.lang.String username)
                           throws EmptyField,
                                  NotExistingUser,
                                  SameUser
        This method gets the registered user to replicate
        Parameters:
        replicatedUsername - Username of the user to replicate
        username - Username of the user that tries to replicate
        Returns:
        User to be replicated
        Throws:
        EmptyField - If no username is inserted
        NotExistingUser - If there is no user with the inserted username
        SameUser - If the user tries to replicate himself

      • replicateUser

        void replicateUser(RegisteredUser user,
                   java.util.Vector<Bet> bets,
                   double betMoney)
            throws InsufficientMoney
        This method replicates all the bets of another user
        Parameters:
        user - User that will take all the bets
        bets - Bets to be replicated
        betMoney - Money that has been bet
        Throws:
        InsufficientMoney - if the user has not the neccessary money to make all the bets

      • getBetContainer

        BetContainer getBetContainer(Bet b,
                             RegisteredUser user)
                      throws NotSelectedBet
        This method returns the BetContainer object of a Bet
        Parameters:
        b - Bet to return its BetContainer
        user - RegisterUser that contains the bet b
        Returns:
        BetContainer of the inserted bet
        Throws:
        NotSelectedBet - if no bet is chosen
